headline: Cloudflare and CrowdStrike partner to give CISOs secure control across devices, applications, and corporate networks
keywords: Security Week, Partners, CrowdStrike, Cloudflare Zero Trust, Security, Zero Trust, Product News
description: We're very excited to announce multiple new integrations with CrowdStrike. These integrations combine the power of Cloudflare’s expansive network and Zero Trust suite, with CrowdStrike’s Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) and incident remediation offerings
